about_the_game:
Unique Hero System: Each character is based on a familiar archetype and has their own unique attack which will greatly affect your play style. In addition all characters have unique attributes that alter their speed, damage, and more. Upgrade them all with no microtransactions, how games used to be!



Endless Score Attack: Earn Gems and Runes that let you power up your character to take on missions in Story Plus mode. Can you fight your way back home?


Weapon Synergy: Combine weapons in unique ways, completely changing the gameplay. Try and see which combinations are strongest!


Story Mode: Travel through multiple levels and biomes with our exiled heroes as they fend off hordes of enemies to find their way to the old Sanctuary they once called home.


Hordes of Hordes: Fight horde after horde of dozens of different enemies. An infinite amount of demons, devils, natural abominations, and all sorts of other creeping, crawling, slithering hell-spawn are waiting for you.

- Play as 5 of the 12 unique custom heroes, each with unique attacks
- Fight across 4 of 8 intended biomes in story mode, or Endless mode, where the real game begins
- Battle against 20 of 70 planned enemies, each with it's own strengths and weaknesses
- Colect multiple runes/gems allowing weapon customization for endless replayability
- Listen to 4 of 10 custom tracks, made just for the game

name: Super Demon Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 2.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Storage: 190 MB available space

reviews:
“Super Demon Survivors - You Don't Get Much Higher Value For $3 Than This!”
9.5 – Zaxtor99
short_description: Super Demon Survivors is a homage to time survival reverse bullet hells, set in a familiar world pitting multiple characters against hordes of demons and monsters in a multistage free for all.
